name: TruMix
0:
”Alexa, open true mix radio”
”Alexa, start true mix radio”
”Alexa, play true mix radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: true mix radio
des: Embark on a sonic journey through the heart of three iconic decades with TruMix. We’re the bridge between the synth-pop sensations of the 80s, the grunge and hip-hop revolutions of the 90s, and the digital pop evolution of the 00s. Our playlist is a vibrant tapestry of the eras, weaving together the electric anthems of Madonna, the defiant chords of Nirvana, and the infectious beats of The Black Eyed Peas. This is where memories are rekindled, and new ones are made, all set to the soundtrack of the most influential periods in modern music history.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
